name: A Care Package in Quarantine
description:
A Care Package in Quarantine is a small game that is partly autobiographic, partly inspired from friends' stories. It was made for and inspired by the "You're The Best" GamesPlusJam 2021 by GamesPlusJames.

Move around using the arrow keys or the WASD keys if you prefer. You can also advance text with any key. This game was designed to be accessible for diverse types of color blindness. If you have any issues, I recommend turning off the orange-tinting Night Light filters as they tend to blend the colors together.

You can also press the full screen button on the bottom right to really feel the pixels.

This game was made using Bitsy: http://bitsy.org
